name: Economic Conquest
description: Economic Conquest is a tycoon simulation strategy game with a single goal in mind: conquer the world economy! Select a starting country, build up your business, improve it, maximize your profits and spread your economic influence throughout the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB) Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD Storage: 220 MB available space
